From Date To Date
Map Location of KFC Las Vegas Locations
K F C locations in Las Vegas
Find the KFC (Kentucky Fied Chicken) nearest you in the Las Vegas Valley. The fast food chicken restaurant has over 43 locations to choose from. Locations stretch from Boulder City, Jean, NV. Since the Las Vegas Valley is still growing, more locations will be added to this page as they are established.
Don't forget to check out KFC's online printable coupons. Take these coupons to any participating KFC and make your day Kentucky Fried Chicken Kind of day!
All you have to do is click on the link below and fill out the online form, and you're all set to get your printable coupons!
-------> KFC Online Coupons <------
Find the location nearest you by choosing from the locations listed below.
